game_select.title: Game Selection
game_select.subtitle: Select the game you are managing mods for

launch_options.message: To unlock the full functionality of Manderrow, one small tweak must be made to your Steam configuration.
launch_options.message_overwrite: It seems you've set some Launch Options for this game in Steam. To unlock the full functionality of Manderrow, those Launch Options will need to be changed.

apply.label: Do it for me
apply.description: We'll go ahead and apply the changes for you. If you have it open, Steam will be closed as part of this process.

retry.label: Do it myself
retry.description: You'll need to paste the following string in the Launch Options field for the game in Steam: {{ launch_options }}

ignore.label: Trust me, I know what I'm doing
ignore.description: Whatever you say, pal. You're on your own!

abort.label: I don't want to
abort.description: No worries. Unfortunately, you'll be unable to launch with Manderrow at this time.

error.title: Oops! An error occurred...
error.deescalation_msg: But don't worry, we caught it for you. We're still in beta, so bugs that can cause errors are expected. Details are below:
error.report_msg: If you would like to help us fix this, please report the error to us below. Your help is greatly appreciated!
error.ignore_msg: Otherwise, you can try to ignore this error and continue using Manderrow for now. Depending on the severity though, this may not be possible.
